channel.title: Bodal on Chaotic Online
channel.description: Recent content in Bodal on Chaotic Online

item.title: A Fearsome Fate
item.description: In the previous episodes, Tom finally got a new scan of his favorite Creature, Maxxor, but when he used it for the first time in battle he realizes that something is wrong.

item.title: A Rare Hazard
item.description: In the first episode of the Second Season, we will have a closure for events of the previous episode, with right to terrorism and espionage

item.title: Chaor's Commandos (Part 1)
item.description: In this episode we’ll see an elite squad led by Chaor in a bold raid on Kiru City towards the Overworld Arsenal

item.title: Chaor's Commandos (Part 2)
item.description: In the continuation of the previous episode we’ll see Chaor’s invasion to the Overworld Arsenal in Kiru City

item.title: Chaotic Crisis
item.description: In this episode, the Creatures of Chaotic invade Earth! Let’s get Chaotic… for our planet!

item.title: Fallen Hero
item.description: In this episode we’ll see a treacherous coup of Lord Van Bloot against Maxxor that could destroy the OverWorld.

item.title: Last Stand (Part 1)
item.description: In this episode, the beginning of the end… the battle for Perim is now!

item.title: Raznus Returns
item.description: In this episode, a problematic excavation leads some Mandiblors led by Odu-Bathax and Raznus, former OverWorld Ambassador to the Danians, now Assimilated, to the basement of the Arsenal of OverWorld

item.title: The Thing About Bodal
item.description: In this episode we’ll meet Bodal, a Creature very talkative, annoying and cocky about himself. We’ll also see the most improbable of all fights in Chaotic.
